DOC.brief_summary: To investigate efficacy GV1001 sequential combination gemcitabine locally advance metastatic adenocarcinoma pancreas .
DOC.brief_title: GV1001 Gemcitabine Sequential Combination Gemcitabine Monotherapy Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The trial Phase III , multinational , multicentre , control , randomise open-label trial . It involve 520 advanced pancreatic cancer patient . Patients randomly assign receive Gemcitabine alone GV1001 plus GM-CSF follow addition Gemcitabine time 1st progression disease . The experimental treatment give prior current standard treatment 50 % patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Histologically cytologically confirm , unresectable , locally advanced , metastatic adenocarcinoma pancreas . 2 . Adequate hematological parameter : Hemoglobin > /= 9.5 g/dL [ SI unit , 5.9 mmol/L ] WBC > /= 3000/mm3 [ SI unit , > /= 3 x 109/L ] Platelets > /= 100,000/mm3 [ SI unit , > /= 100 x 109/L ] 3 . Adequate baseline liver function : Total Bilirubin < 3x ULN Without liver metastasis : AST ( SGOT ) < /= 2.5 x ULN ALT ( SGPT ) < /= 2.5 x ULN With liver metastasis : AST ( SGOT ) < /= 5 x ULN ALT ( SGPT ) < /= 5 x ULN 4 . Serum creatinine < /= 1.5 mg/dL [ SI unit , 132 Âµmol/L ] . 5 . Performance status ECOG 01 . 6 . Male female 18 75 year inclusive . 7 . Minimum life expectancy 3 month . 8 . Written informed consent . 1 . Treatment chemotherapy pancreatic cancer . 2 . Treatment investigational drug within last 4 week prior inclusion 3 . Immunesuppressive therapy < 4 week prior inclusion 4 . Chronic corticosteroid use except asthma inhaler / topical use 5 . Radiotherapy within 8 week randomisation . 6 . Other prior malignancy except adequately treat nonmelanoma skin cancer ( BCC , SCC ) carcinoma situ cervix . 7 . Known diagnosis HIV ( AIDS ) , Hepatitis B , C. 8 . Known history coexist autoimmune disease . 9 . Known CNS metastasis . 10 . Clinically significant serious disease organ system disease currently control present therapy . 11 . Pregnancy lactation . 12 . Women childbearing potential use reliable adequate contraceptive methods* 13 . Known sensitivity component vaccine , gemcitabine GMCSF . 14 . Unable reason comply protocol ( treatment assessment ) . Adequate contraceptive method define use oral , implanted , injectable , mechanical barrier product prevention pregnancy ; woman practise abstinence ; partner sterile , example vasectomy .
